Author: hammerprice
Text: Being able to recognise this about yourself has given you a form of power over yourself and your ED. Whether it's about control, or losing weight, it's your brain saying these things, and you are your brain. You have control over the control.  Does that sound space age enough? Lol, I dont know if this is helpful. But I can relate a lot to how you're feeling. And if these thoughts scare you, being able to see them for what they are is the key to your control.
